# MTLPatchType.none

**Case**

An option that indicates that this isn’t a post-tessellation vertex function.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Patch types

- **MTLPatchType.triangle**: A triangle patch.
- **MTLPatchType.quad**: A quad patch.
title: MTLPatchType.none
